replies.body: IIRC, Rammus got a big winrate spike in the past few days.

> [{quoted}](name=Lady Boners,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ojQwyI06,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-14T20:59:27.463+0000)
>
> http://i.imgur.com/JkkeIgG.png?1

One match does not decide the entire game.
Dealing with Rammus is easier now due to the item changes.

Dealing with ADCs as Rammus is easier now due to the item changes
(Static Shiv, Deadman's plate, Thornmail)

> [{quoted}](name=Tworie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ojQwyI06,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-11-14T23:17:39.428+0000)
>
> Dealing with ADCs as Rammus is easier now due to the item changes
> (Static Shiv, Deadman's plate, Thornmail)

QSS
350 AD from armor and 1 AD item + AD pot + crits + ult + Q +AAs
QSS won't save you from the Rammus damage. He hurts. A lot.
why aren't people playing swain then?  he literally loves fighting ADCs because unless he's focused, he will take everyone down at the same time
because he still gets rekt by adc's who can competently kite including low range ones

No ADC can kite a good Rammus :/
Especially not with Deadman's plate + Static Shiv + Maxed out Q

if there's a minion wave, the adc doesn't even need to kite, unfortunately

he seems a lot better at taking out mid laners and top laners now because they're the easiest lanes to overextend while dueling so he can literally backdoor them in the neutral zone, then proceed to use his ultimate to kill the tower with his laner
I think it's because people don't want to grind for the scaling/flat armor runes to actually play him and they're too scared to take him into lane with exhaust and ignite

they are and hes at 60% winrate right now. because the goddamn marksmen are once again the center of everything and killing them wins the game.

only that this time there are just like 2 champions that can deal with them.
well i am playing ad with a bit of tankiness vi and god it feels good oneshoting people who can oneshot people {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
